Name: Asteroids and more asteroids
About the game: In a game inspired by the classic 'Asteroids', you'll play with a small spaceship in order to score more points and beat all records!! Asteroids and... more asteroids , this game is a mix of 'Asteroids' and rhythm, match colors to the same colors and avoid the different ones. Do you have the coordination necessary to be the world record holder in the online ranking system ? Main features: -More than 30 different ships. -Various enemies for you to destroy. -Customize even the colors you will use!! -Online ranking to prove to your friend that you are better than him! -CO-OP for two players, each one controlling a color. -There are asteroids, many of them...
